about_the_game:
A dark and mysterious planet

There are two unique zones to explore in which many secrets are yet to be uncovered. By overcoming the challenges in your path, you will be rewarded with information about your mentor as well as a new power, but it will not be easy.

A hostile welcome

A lot of dangerous creatures are roaming around, so be ready to fight and don't let them make the first move. The combat is fast paced and can be brutal if you underestimate your enemies. Perform strong martial arts combos and dodge incoming attacks to defeat your foes.

Survival of the fittest

Collect as many resources as you can if you want to succeed in your mission. Using the crafting menu you can combine plants to make injections that can heal your wounds or make your attacks more powerful. You can also find all the log entries that you've discovered and some information about the creatures you've defeated by navigating trough your inventory.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, weapons, mild cursing, implied cannibalism,

short_description: Signal is an immersive action-adventure game made as a student project where you attempt to uncover the mystery behind your old mentor's distress message. To succeed in your mission, you will have to use your martial arts skills and fight off hostile creatures that are trying to stop you.
